definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: So your car doesn't really need the higher octane.
sentences.chinese: 您沒必要買那種含有辛烷的汽油。

sentences.english: One of the best sites to find gas-related information is GasBuddy.com.
sentences.chinese: 便是一個你能獲得與汽油相關信息的最好的網站之一。

sentences.english: Before travelling we must ensure the availability of petrol and oil.
sentences.chinese: 旅行前，我們必須確保能夠買到汽油和機油。

sentences.english: It tastes like rancid fish steeped in gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 白酒的味道就像泡着腐魚的汽油。

sentences.english: In fact, we import more gasoline into Afghanistan than any other product.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，我們從阿富汗進口最多的物資就是汽油。

sentences.english: About the plane from the ground, the McCarran ignited the gasoline floating down the runway.
sentences.chinese: 在飛機即將離地時，麥卡倫點燃了跑道上灑落的汽油。

sentences.english: A gasoline engine drives the motorboat.
Use the difference in gasoline prices to add to savings.
sentences.chinese: 利用汽油價格的差異來增加你的儲蓄。

sentences.english: Never transport gasoline in the trunk of your car.
sentences.chinese: 從來運輸汽油車貴的主幹。

sentences.english: The Premier announces that state-run petroleum company will raise gasoline prices from midnight.
sentences.chinese: 總理宣佈，國營石油公司將從午夜起調漲汽油價格。

sentences.english: Levying a tax on leaded gasoline is an important policy to implement the use of unleaded gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 徵收含鉛汽油稅是實行汽油無鉛化的一項重要政策。

sentences.english: Levying a tax on leaded gasoline is an important policy to implement the use of unleaded gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 徵收含鉛汽油稅是實行汽油無鉛化的一項重要政策。

sentences.english: After gasoline and oil filling, check handle bar, brake and clutch.
sentences.chinese: 在汽油和油，檢查處理吧，剎車和離合器。

sentences.english: I can't stand the smell of petrol and always become dizzy in a car.
sentences.chinese: 我受不了汽油味，每次坐車都覺得頭暈。
四衝程汽油在摩托車發動機。
